faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about donations and impact

questions.question: How is my donation used?
questions.answer: Your donations are used to support student scholarships, preserve ancient manuscripts, train teachers, and develop educational content. We maintain transparency in all our financial operations.

questions.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
questions.answer: Yes, donations to Shikshanam are tax-deductible under Section 80G of the Income Tax Act. You will receive a receipt for your donation.

questions.question: Can I choose where my donation goes?
questions.answer: Yes, you can specify which cause you'd like to support when making your donation. You can choose from scholarships, manuscript preservation, or teacher training.

questions.question: How can I track the impact of my donation?
questions.answer: We provide regular updates on our website and through email newsletters about how donations are being used and the impact they're creating.
